website_summaries.verdict: The majority of the purchasers commented that the Asics DynaFlyte 2 is a lightweight, comfortable and supportive shoe. They were satisfied with its well-constructed upper. They loved wearing the shoe not only in running and walking sessions but also on casual occasions. They agreed that its design was visually-appealing and its cushioning was excellent.
pros: Most of the reviewers loved the shoe’s well-constructed upper
Some testers mentioned that the cushioning was great
A handful of consumers agreed that the shoe was comfortable
A good number of purchasers noted that the product was supportive and lightweight
A lot of users experienced less skin irritation and blisters
Several consumers lauded its attractive casual design
cons: According to those who have tried it, the product had limited color variations

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these while they were reduced and were cheaper than my usual Gel Nimbus shoes I use for running and in the gym. While these are a lighter weight they provide the same support and come with the advantage that they are better on hotter days and on the treadmill. All in all excellent shoes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brodie

customer_reviews.title: High quality as always from Asics
customer_reviews.text: Used exclusively for treadmill running, fit and comfort both high performing factors and these Asics hit both parameters very well. Highest price I have ever paid for trainers but you get what you pay for. Highly recommended purchase
customer_reviews.author: Foo

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Nice for running outdoors. Bought them for my husband who’s normally very picky and peculiar about his running gear and he had no negative comment about them as yet (have them for few weeks now). That is great feedback in itself ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son specifically to go on the running machine. I liked the design and colour, as well as the reviews
customer_reviews.author: d s davis

customer_reviews.title: A lighter vesrion of Nimbus
customer_reviews.text: A lighter version of Nimbus. I train with Nimbus and race with Dynaflite. Very satisfied with the shoes and the response of the vendor
customer_reviews.author: I. Angelis

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable running shoes. Fit as expected. Great cushioning and support.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Carney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but half size larger would be better, had to replace
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of these and they're great, best runners that I've had. Light and very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: A whole lot of shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Such a shame. Asics have managed to create an extraordinary Trompe L'Oei, as while the shoe seems to run true to size, the visual effect is of one at least 2 or 3 sizes bigger. The Dynaflyte cushioning may well be highly effective, but I just couldn't take my feet seriously in them. Having said that, I can see plenty of P.B's being broken, as the toe of the shoe will almost certainly cross the line at least 40 to 60 seconds ahead of the athlete. A whole lot of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Longer than expected
customer_reviews.text: Not really tried them as have ordered a smaller size as they are longer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Owens

customer_reviews.title: Awful running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am truly stumped as to how people are claiming this running show is comfortable? 2 miles+ of road running and I’m in agony, my feet slapping against the ground, my feet are bruised and beaten after every run. Am I missing something? The cushioning is absolutely non-existent, truly agonising. Worst of all? I complained to Asics as they’re falsely advertising the product and they may as well have told me to f off.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Glennon

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Dynaflyte 2 Training Shoes
product_meta.description: The ascis dynaflyte shoe for men is made with a padded anchor with gel cushioning in the back foot and has a modernized upper with adapt mesh technology that makes the shoe very light. In addition, the impact guidance system (i gs) combines the movements and the natural anatomy of your feet and the 3 m reflectivity makes you visible. It is made with a guideline, which makes your foot receive complete support. The full-length flytefoam shock absorber makes the shoe very comfortable. It has an eva insole modeled on the shape of the foot, which can be removed.
feature_bullets: Breathable Mesh Upper - Keeps you ventilated and comfortable.
Moisture Management - Wicks away excess sweat and moisture.
ComfortDry X-40 Sockliner - Adds comfort and guards against chafing.
3M Reflective - Improves safety and visibility in low light conditions.
FlyteFoam Midsole - Provides lightweight, comfortable and durable cushioning.
